verses.verse: וּמֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> Now Moses הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become רֹעֶ֛ה <WH7462> was pasturing אֶת־ <WH853> צֹ֛אן <WH6629> the flock יִתְר֥וֹ <WH3503> of Jethro חֹתְנ֖וֹ <WH2859> his father in law כֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> the priest מִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> of Midian וַיִּנְהַ֤ג <WH5090> and he led אֶת־ <WH853> הַצֹּאן֙ <WH6629> the flock אַחַ֣ר <WH310> to the backside הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> of the desert וַיָּבֹ֛א <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> about הַ֥ר <WH2022> to the mountain הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God חֹרֵֽבָה׃ <WH2722> [even] to Horeb

וַ֠יֵּרָא <WH7200> appeared מַלְאַ֨ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהֹוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> unto בְּלַבַּת־ <WH3827> unto him in a flame אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst הַסְּנֶ֑ה <WH5572> of a bush וַיַּ֗רְא <WH7200> and he looked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold הַסְּנֶה֙ <WH5572> and behold the bush בֹּעֵ֣ר <WH1197> burned בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> with fire וְהַסְּנֶ֖ה <WH5572> and the bush אֵינֶ֥נּוּ <WH369> was not אֻכָּֽל׃ <WH398> [was] not consumed

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אָסֻֽרָה־ <WH5493> I will now turn aside נָּ֣א <WH4994> now וְאֶרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> and see אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּרְאֶ֥ה <WH4758> sight הַגָּדֹ֖ל <WH1419> this great הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this מַדּ֖וּעַ <WH4069> why לֹא־ <WH3808> is not יִבְעַ֥ר <WH1197> is not burnt הַסְּנֶֽה׃ <WH5572> the bush

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And when the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> for סָ֣ר <WH5493> that he turned aside לִרְא֑וֹת <WH7200> to see וַיִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> called אֵלָ֨יו <WH413> about אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> God מִתּ֣וֹךְ <WH8432> unto him out of the midst הַסְּנֶ֗ה <WH5572> of the bush וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> and said מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> Moses מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> Moses וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> Here

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said אַל־ <WH408> not תִּקְרַ֣ב <WH7126> Draw not nigh הֲלֹ֑ם <WH1988> hither שַׁל־ <WH5394> put off נְעָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5275> thy shoes מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from רַגְלֶ֔יךָ <WH7272> from off thy feet כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> for the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whereon אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you עוֹמֵ֣ד <WH5975> thou standest עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> and אַדְמַת־ <WH127> ground קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> He

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> Moreover he said אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> I [am] the God אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> of thy father אֱלֹהֵ֧י <WH430> the God אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God יִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> and the God יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> of Jacob וַיַּסְתֵּ֤ר <WH5641> hid מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> his face כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יָרֵ֔א <WH3372> for he was afraid מֵהַבִּ֖יט <WH5027> to look אֶל־ <WH413> at הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> upon God

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD רָאֹ֥ה <WH7200> I have surely רָאִ֛יתִי <WH7200> seen אֶת־ <WH853> עֳנִ֥י <WH6040> the affliction עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> of my people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> which [are] in Egypt וְאֶת־ <WH853> צַעֲקָתָ֤ם <WH6818> their cry שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH8085> and have heard מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> by reason נֹֽגְשָׂ֔יו <WH5065> of their taskmasters כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יָדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> for I know אֶת־ <WH853> מַכְאֹבָֽיו׃ <WH4341> their sorrows

וָאֵרֵ֞ד <WH3381> And I am come down לְהַצִּיל֣וֹ ׀ <WH5337> to deliver מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> them out of the hand מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וּֽלְהַעֲלֹתוֹ֮ <WH5927> and to bring מִן־ <WH4480> that הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> them up out of that land הַהִוא֒ <WH1931> he אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> land טוֹבָה֙ <WH2896> unto a good וּרְחָבָ֔ה <WH7342> and a large אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> unto a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> flowing חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָ֑שׁ <WH1706> and honey אֶל־ <WH413> to מְק֤וֹם <WH4725> unto the place הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> of the Canaanites וְהַ֣חִתִּ֔י <WH2850> and the Hittites וְהָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> and the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> and the Perizzites וְהַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <WH2983> and the Jebusites

וְעַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> Now הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> behold צַעֲקַ֥ת <WH6818> Now therefore behold the cry בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בָּ֣אָה <WH935> is come אֵלָ֑י <WH413> to me וְגַם־ <WH1571> furthermore רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <WH7200> unto me and I have also seen אֶת־ <WH853> הַלַּ֔חַץ <WH3906> the oppression אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4713> Egyptian לֹחֲצִ֥ים <WH3905> oppress אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now לְכָ֔ה <WH1980> come וְאֶֽשְׁלָחֲךָ֖ <WH7971> now therefore and I will send אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> thee unto Pharaoh וְהוֹצֵ֛א <WH3318> that thou mayest bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> my people בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> out of Egypt

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> unto God מִ֣י <WH4310> Who אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> I כִּ֥י <WH3588> should אֵלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> go אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh וְכִ֥י <WH3588> should אוֹצִ֛יא <WH3318> and that I should bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> Egypt

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And he said כִּֽי־ <WH3588> unto thee that אֶֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> you וְזֶה־ <WH2088> and this לְּךָ֣ הָא֔וֹת <WH226> Certainly I will be with thee and this [shall be] a token כִּ֥י <WH3588> Certainly אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> is i שְׁלַחְתִּ֑יךָ <WH7971> I have sent בְּהוֹצִֽיאֲךָ֤ <WH3318> thee When thou hast brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָם֙ <WH5971> the people מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt תַּֽעַבְדוּן֙ <WH5647> ye shall serve אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> God עַ֖ל <WH5921> and הָהָ֥ר <WH2022> upon this mountain הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הָֽאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> unto God הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I בָא֮ <WH935> Behold [when] I come אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתִּ֣י <WH559> and shall say לָהֶ֔ם אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> unto them The God אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> of your fathers שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <WH7971> hath sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> to וְאָֽמְרוּ־ <WH559> me unto you and they shall say לִ֣י מַה־ <WH4100> What שְּׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> to me מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אֹמַ֖ר <WH559> say אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses אֶֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> I AM אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> WHO אֶֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> THAT I AM וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he said כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus תֹאמַר֙ <WH559> Thus shalt thou say לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> I am שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <WH7971> I AM hath sent אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said ע֨וֹד <WH5750> moreover אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus תֹאמַר֮ <WH559> Thus shalt thou say אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1> of your fathers אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> the God אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God יִצְחָ֛ק <WH3327> of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> and the God יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> of Jacob שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <WH7971> hath sent אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> to זֶה־ <WH2088> This שְּׁמִ֣י <WH8034> me unto you this [is] my name לְעֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> for ever וְזֶ֥ה <WH2088> and this זִכְרִ֖י <WH2143> and this [is] my memorial לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> unto all דֹּֽר׃ <WH1755> generations

לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go וְאָֽסַפְתָּ֞ <WH622> together אֶת־ <WH853> זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֤ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> to יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> unto them The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> of your fathers נִרְאָ֣ה <WH7200> appeared אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about אֱלֹהֵ֧י <WH430> the God אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> of Abraham יִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> of Isaac וְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> and of Jacob לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> unto me saying פָּקֹ֤ד <WH6485> I have surely פָּקַ֙דְתִּי֙ <WH6485> visited אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> הֶעָשׂ֥וּי <WH6213> you and [seen] that which is done לָכֶ֖ם בְּמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> to you in Egypt

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> And I have said אַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> I will bring אֶתְכֶם֮ <WH853> מֵעֳנִ֣י <WH6040> you up out of the affliction מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> of Egypt אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> unto the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> of the Canaanites וְהַ֣חִתִּ֔י <WH2850> and the Hittites וְהָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> and the Amorites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> and the Perizzites וְהַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֑י <WH2983> and the Jebusites אֶל־ <WH413> to אֶ֛רֶץ <WH776> unto a land זָבַ֥ת <WH2100> flowing חָלָ֖ב <WH2461> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <WH1706> and honey

וְשָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> And they shall hearken לְקֹלֶ֑ךָ <WH6963> to thy voice וּבָאתָ֡ <WH935> and thou shalt come אַתָּה֩ <WH859> you וְזִקְנֵ֨י <WH2205> thou and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king מִצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH559> and ye shall say אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> unto him The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God הָֽעִבְרִיִּים֙ <WH5680> of the Hebrews נִקְרָ֣ה <WH7136> hath met עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> with וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now נֵֽלֲכָה־ <WH1980> go נָּ֞א <WH4994> please דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> journey שְׁלֹ֤שֶׁת <WH7969> we beseech thee three יָמִים֙ <WH3117> days' בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> into the wilderness וְנִזְבְּחָ֖ה <WH2076> that we may sacrifice לַֽיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> to the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God

וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> And I am sure כִּ֠י <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> except יִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> will not let אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לַהֲלֹ֑ךְ <WH1980> you go וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> except בְּיָ֥ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָֽה׃ <WH2389> no not by a mighty

וְשָׁלַחְתִּ֤י <WH7971> And I will stretch out אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִי֙ <WH3027> my hand וְהִכֵּיתִ֣י <WH5221> and smite אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4713> Egyptian בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all נִפְלְאֹתַ֔י <WH6381> with all my wonders אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> which I will do בְּקִרְבּ֑וֹ <WH7130> in the midst וְאַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> thereof and after כֵ֖ן <WH3651> after that יְשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> that he will let you go אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וְנָתַתִּ֛י <WH5414> And I will give אֶת־ <WH853> חֵ֥ן <WH2580> favour הָֽעָם־ <WH5971> this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4713> Egyptian וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become כִּ֣י <WH3588> for תֵֽלֵכ֔וּן <WH1980> go לֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תֵלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> go רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> empty

וְשָׁאֲלָ֨ה <WH7592> shall borrow אִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> But every woman מִשְּׁכֶנְתָּהּ֙ <WH7934> of her neighbour וּמִגָּרַ֣ת <WH1481> and of her that sojourneth בֵּיתָ֔הּ <WH1004> in her house כְּלֵי־ <WH3627> jewels כֶ֛סֶף <WH3701> of silver וּכְלֵ֥י <WH3627> and jewels זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold וּשְׂמָלֹ֑ת <WH8071> and raiment וְשַׂמְתֶּ֗ם <WH7760> and ye shall put עַל־ <WH5921> on בְּנֵיכֶם֙ <WH1121> [them] upon your sons וְעַל־ <WH5921> and בְּנֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1323> and upon your daughters וְנִצַּלְתֶּ֖ם <WH5337> and ye shall spoil אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4713> Egyptian
